mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.color AS color, p.size AS size, ss.shop_stock_id AS shop_stock_id, ss.stock AS stock FROM shop_stock ss JOIN product p ON ss.product_id=p.product_id WHERE ss.shop_id = #{shopid}

SELECT ss.shop_stock_id AS shop_stock_id, ss.date AS date, ss.discount AS discount, p.product_id AS product_id, p.season AS season, p.gender AS gender, p.fit AS fit, p.consumer_price AS consumer_price, p.first_cost AS first_cost FROM shop_stock ss JOIN product p ON ss.product_id=p.product_id WHERE ss.shop_stock_id=#{stockid}
